title: How to Make a Honey and Oatmeal Face Mask

steps.title: Find a mixing bowl.
steps.content: Find a mixing bowl. You will need something to mix all of your ingredients in. Because you are working with such small amounts, you can use a small bowl or even a cup.

steps.title: Make sure your oats are finely-ground.
steps.content: Make sure your oats are finely-ground. You want a coarse, flour-like texture. If your oats are too grainy and chunky, then you will have to grind them using a blender, coffee grinder, or a food processor.

steps.title: Place the oats into the bowl.
steps.content: Place the oats into the bowl. Measure out 3 tablespoons of oats and place them into the bowl.

steps.title: Add some hot water and mix.
steps.content: Add some hot water and mix. You want your oats to be soft for this mask, so measure out 1 tablespoon (14.8 ml) of very hot water, and add it to the oats. Mix the two ingredients until they are combined.

steps.title: Let the mixture cool a little.
steps.content: Let the mixture cool a little. Before moving onto the next steps, let the oats cool for a few moments. [1] X Research source This also gives the oats enough time to absorb the water, making them more supple.

steps.title: Add the honey and stir.
steps.content: Add the honey and stir. You will need 1 tablespoon (14.8 ml) of honey. Be sure that it is the clear, runny type. Measure out the honey, add it to the bowl, and mix with a spoon until everything is combined.

steps.title: Consider adding or substituting other ingredients.
steps.content: Consider adding or substituting other ingredients. You can use your facial mask as it is, or you can add other ingredients into it as well. You can also substitute certain ingredients for others. Her are some ideas: [2] X Research source Instead of using hot water, use 1 tablespoon (14.8 ml) of cold milk. You can also use 1 tablespoon (14.8 ml) of chamomile tea instead of water. Add a few mashed up banana slices to the oats. Consider adding a few drops of almond oil. Replace the water with 1 tablespoon (14.8 ml) of olive oil instead, for a more nourishing mask.

steps.title: Consider a honey-lemon-oatmeal mask.
steps.content: Consider a honey-lemon-oatmeal mask. If you suffer from acne, then this mask may be just the thing for you. It contains ground oats, honey, lemon juice, and tea tree oil. Here are the benefits of each ingredient: Oats act as a natural cleanser and have both exfoliating and anti-inflammatory properties. [3] X Expert Source R. Sonia Batra, MD, MSc, MPH Board Certified Dermatologist Expert Interview. 19 February 2021 Honey has both antibacterial and antioxidant properties, which make it great for managing acne and blackheads. [4] X Research source Lemons have antibacterial and anti-fungal properties, which makes them great for managing acne and blackheads. Tea tree oil is a natural antiseptic. [5] X Research source Tea tree oil is a natural antiseptic and toner.

steps.title: Make sure the oats are finely ground.
steps.content: Make sure the oats are finely ground. If your oats are whole or too grainy, then you can grind them up in a blender, a coffee grinder, or a food processor.

steps.title: Obtain a mixing bowl.
steps.content: Obtain a mixing bowl. Because you are working in such small amounts, you can use anything as your mixing bowl, from a cup to a small bowl to even an old yogurt container.

steps.title: Add the ground oats in the mixing bowl.
steps.content: Add the ground oats in the mixing bowl. Measure out 2 tablespoons of ground oats and pour them into your bowl.

steps.title: Pour in some the honey.
steps.content: Pour in some the honey. Measure out 2 tablespoons (29.6 ml) of honey and add it into the mixing bowl. You want the runny, translucent type of honey.

steps.title: Add fresh lemon juice to the bowl.
steps.content: Add fresh lemon juice to the bowl. You need ½ tablespoon of lemon juice. Using fresh lemon juice is recommended over concentrated lemon juice, which may be too harsh for your skin. If you don't have fresh lemon juice, simply cut a lemon in half and squeeze the juice out from one of the halves until you have enough. Add the lemon juice into the mixture, wrap up the remaining lemon, and store it in the fridge for later use.

steps.title: Add the tea tree oil.
steps.content: Add the tea tree oil. You will need ½ tablespoon of the lemon juice and 4 drops of tea tree essential oil.

steps.title: Mix everything together.
steps.content: Mix everything together. Using a spoon or fork, mix everything together until you get a thick, grainy paste. This will be enough for one or two facials.

steps.title: Consider making a soothing mask.
steps.content: Consider making a soothing mask. If you have dry or sensitive skin, the ingredients from the acne mask may be too drying for you. Instead, make a more soothing mask using oats, yogurt, and honey. Here are the benefits of each ingredient: Oats make a great, natural cleanser. They also have both exfoliating and anti-inflammatory properties. Yogurt is full of calcium, protein, and Vitamin D, all of which are important for your skin. It also helps moisturize your skin and even your skin tone. [6] X Research source Honey is a great for reintroducing moisture into dry skin. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Make sure the oats are finely ground.
steps.content: Make sure the oats are finely ground. You want a coarse, flour-like texture. If your oats are too grainy, you will need to grind them up in a blender, a coffee grinder, or a food processor.

steps.title: Find a mixing bowl.
steps.content: Find a mixing bowl. You will need a small bowl or container to mix your ingredients in.

steps.title: Add the ground oats in the mixing bowl.
steps.content: Add the ground oats in the mixing bowl. Measure out 1 tablespoon of ground oats and pour them into your bowl.

steps.title: Pour in the honey.
steps.content: Pour in the honey. You will need 1 teaspoon of honey. Make sure that it is the clear, runny type.

steps.title: Add the yogurt.
steps.content: Add the yogurt. Measure out 1 teaspoon of yogurt and add it into the bowl. To reduce the risk of irritation, use a plain, unsweetened yogurt. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Mix everything together.
steps.content: Mix everything together. Using a spoon or fork, mix all of the ingredients together until you have a thick paste. If the mixture is too thick and clumpy, then add a little more honey or yogurt.

steps.title: Protect your clothes.
steps.content: Protect your clothes. The facemasks you have made will be very gloopy and messy. Consider draping a towel over the front of your chest and shoulders to protect your clothes. You can also wear something that you do not mind getting dirty.

steps.title: Protect your hair.
steps.content: Protect your hair. While the ingredients you have used are not bad for your hair, you will probably have to wash your hair completely if you get any of the oatmeal mask on it. To prevent this, tie your hair into a pony tail to keep it away from your face. If you have short hair, then consider wearing a shower cap.

steps.title: Start with a fresh, clean face.
steps.content: Start with a fresh, clean face. If you have not already, wash your face with your usual facial cleanser and water. Lightly pat your face dry with a clean towel.

steps.title: Apply the mask to your face.
steps.content: Apply the mask to your face. Using your fingers, start gently massaging the mask into your face, using circular motions. Apply the mask into your forehead, nose, cheekbones, and jaw. Do not apply it on your mouth or eyes.

steps.title: Leave the mask on your face.
steps.content: Leave the mask on your face. Let the mask sit on your face for 10 to 15 minutes. If you are using the soothing, yogurt-based mask, consider leaving the mask on for 15 to 20 minutes instead. The mask may harden or start to flake off as it dries; this is normal and to be expected. While waiting for your mask to dry, consider taking a relaxing bath or soak .

steps.title: Rinse the mask off.
steps.content: Rinse the mask off. Using cool water, gently wash the face mask off. Be sure to use the same circular, massaging motions that you used to put the mask on.

steps.title: Consider applying toner and moisturizer.
steps.content: Consider applying toner and moisturizer. Once your face is clean, follow up with your usual skincare regime. If you don't have a skincare regime, them you can consider applying some toner and moisturizer. To apply the toner, simply soak a cotton ball with some toner, and sweep it over your face, focusing on the forehead, nose, and cheekbones. The toner will help tighten your pores. To apply some moisturizer, simply squeeze some of your favorite facial moisturizer onto your palm, and apply it to your face using your fingers. Avoid the sensitive areas around your nose and mouth.
